name: Judge Us. I Can't Elaborate.
description:
From the scraps of the past a new government has been formed. With new government come new laws. Even though the law is not perfected, you will use it to pass judgment.

Take role of a final judge of the most difficult crime cases and use law to your advantage to decide which criminals will be granted freedom and which will not commit crime ever again.

"Judge Us. I Can't Elaborate" has been created within a week as a submission for GDB Juice Jam II (https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam-ii).

Special thanks for Ama & Godyr for finding time and testing it.
